title: Ep 401 | Si and Jase Have a Real Issue with Each Other & Jase Describes Jesus in Uncomfortable Ways
description:
In this last "Unashamed" of 2021, Jase gives suggestions for some new duck blind additions to accommodate the geriatric hunters the guys are becoming. Al and Jase reflect on the year and its great happenings and share their predictions for next year. Jase has realized that he and Si have a real issue between them. Phil and Jase discuss middle-aged Jesus and why we don't talk about his upbringing — subjects that Jase says make people uncomfortable. And Jase shares why he believes the Old Testament is such a bleak picture compared to what we see today.

Read the first chapter of "Uncanceled" by Phil Robertson now: https://philrobertson.substack.com/p/uncanceled-chapter-one

Visit http://BollandBranch.com and use the promo code: ROBERTSON and get the best deals of the year through 12/23

Visit http://PatriotMobile.com/PHIL or call 972-PATRIOT and get free activation with the code PHIL!

The ONLY place to get "Your Daily Phil" by Phil Robertson in time to start off your new year: https://talkshop.live/watch/QID3D1y77yHJ
